#REMARK SUMMARY
TITLE	The solution structure of the human IgG subclass

BIOISIS_ID FABSP1	

EXP_DESCRIPTION	SAXS profile of 1 mg/ml intact human IgG2 from human myeloma plasma. The samples were purified by size-exclusion chromatography before dialysis into PBS-137 buffer (137 mM NaCl,8.1 mM Na2HPO4, 2.7 mM KCl and 1.5 mM KH2PO4, pH 7.4) (ESRF, BM29, experiment number: mx1801). The SANS profile of 1 mg/ml intact human IgG2 from human myeloma plasma in the same buffer in 100% heavy water is included (ILL, D22, experiment number: exp_8-03-832).
SOURCE_LOCATION	ESRF BM29

PUBLICATION	The solution structure of the human IgG2 subclass is distinct from those for human IgG1 and IgG4 providing an explanation for their discrete functions. Submitted to Journal of Biological Chemistry (under revision).

#REMARK EXPERIMENTAL CONDITIONS
EXPERIMENTAL_DETAILS	For X-rays, data was collected in a concentration series from 0.5 mg/ml to 4 mg/ml using dialysed samples.X-ray data above concentrations of 1.5 mg/ml were not used due to radiation damage. EDNASUB automatically scalled the intensity by concentration for X-ray data and performed buffer subtraction. The 1 mg/ml sample is used for deposition.
